messages.pass: Element's default semantics were overridden with role="${data.role}"

fail.default: Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
fail.globalAria: Element's role is not presentational because it has a global ARIA attribute
fail.focusable: Element's role is not presentational because it is focusable
fail.both: Element's role is not presentational because it has a global ARIA attribute and is focusable
fail.iframe: Using the "title" attribute on an ${data.nodeName} element with a presentational role behaves inconsistently between screen readers
